name: Computer Science Engineering
description: Comprehensive program covering software development, algorithms, and computer systems with industry-oriented projects.

name: Business Administration
description: Develop leadership and strategic management skills with real-world business case studies and internships.

name: Data Science
description: Master advanced analytics, machine learning, and big data technologies with hands-on projects.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Learn design, analysis, and manufacturing of mechanical systems with modern engineering tools.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Comprehensive program in power systems, electronics, and control systems with lab experiments.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Focus on infrastructure development, construction technology, and sustainable design principles.
